entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 40%
